author: sebb
msg: Clarify that getURI() may return a relative URI

author: pamarcelot
msg: Improved test for ConfigWriter class (Added attribute comparison for each entry of the original ldif file).

author: pamarcelot
msg: Fixed bad name and missing attribute type annotations.

author: coheigea
msg: [WSS-258] - "Newer version of SecureConversation not recognised for derived key algorithm"
- Added support for processing the more recent URI for P_SHA1
- Fixed a bug in DerivedKeyToken where it was adding a prefix for the "Algorithm" attribute. This attribute is not actually used by default, so it's unlikely to affect any existing code.

author: eevans
msg: Hudson runs the tests instrumented by Cobertura, which seems to slow
things down quite a bit.  The build hosts themselves are also likey
subject to more load than we typically see, further stretching the
This change allows overriding the timeouts with -Dtest.timeout and
-Dtest.long.timeout for the short and long tests respectively. These
options shouldn't be needed in typical use.
